participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Creative and determined, always looking for new opportunities to express myself.
participant_1.background: I have an old, dusty laptop that I use to keep in touch with my family. I have never broken a bone. I spend way too much time on my phone in the morning. I am a college drop out. I started my own business.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and family-oriented, I love to explore new things and cherish my relationships.
participant_2.background: I've been fortunate to have a close-knit family my whole life. I sometimes lose track of my surroundings when I'm riding my horse, which can be dangerous. I like to surf. My family is my biggest treasure. I am an Asian-American who loves to grow my own vegetables and spend time with my two brothers.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello!  How are you doing?
I am doing well, thanks for asking.  I am starting a new business and I am really excited about it.
That is great to hear!  I am always happy to hear about people starting new businesses.  What kind of business are you starting?
I am starting an online store that will sell handmade jewelry.
That sounds like a great idea!  I have always loved handmade jewelry.
Thanks!  I am hoping that it will be a success.
I am sure it will be!  What kind of jewelry will you be selling?
I will be selling a variety of jewelry, including necklaces, earrings, bracelets, and rings.
Wow, that sounds like a great selection!  I am sure you will do well.
Thanks!  I am hoping so!
It sounds like you have a lot of experience with jewelry.
Yes, I have been making jewelry for several years now.  I started out as a hobby, but I have really enjoyed it and I have gotten pretty good at it.
That is amazing!  I have always wanted to learn how to make jewelry.
It is not too difficult to learn.  There are a lot of great resources available online.
I will have to look into it.  I would love to be able to make my own jewelry.
It is a lot of fun!  And it is great to be able to give your friends and family personalized gifts.
That is true!  I would love to be able to make personalized gifts for my family and friends.
Well, I hope you will give it a try!  I am sure you will love it.
I will definitely look into it!  Thanks for the recommendation.
